titleStmt.title: The scheme or diagramme adjusted for future use in a larger prodromus ere long to be published, and whereof this is then to be a part.
titleStmt.author: Gibbon, Nicholas, 1605-1697.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
